snippet: From their apartment on Van Brunt Street, atop a small red-brick building, Joseph Hart and Anika Selhorst savor a lazy, small-town mood that is rare in the city.
abstract: Habitats column on Red Hook, Brooklyn home of Anika Selhorst and Joseph Hart; couple pays $1,800 a month in rent for airy 800-square-foot-apartment on Van Brunt Street; spare decor weaves together multiple strands of their peripatetic lives.
lead_paragraph: From their apartment on Van Brunt Street, atop a small red-brick building, Joseph Hart and Anika Selhorst savor a lazy, small-town mood that is rare in the city.

headline.seo: Red Hook, Brooklyn/Habitats - Where New York Comes Up for Air
headline.main: Where New York Comes Up for Air
headline.print_headline: Where New York Comes Up for Air
